cell.html: Full name: Kathleen Darlene Knight née Day Kath is an empty nester who is proud of her home - ditto herself. She likes to keep herself busy throughout the day with her various projects and likes to keep herself trim.
cell.text: Full name: Kathleen Darlene Knight née Day Kath is an empty nester who is proud of her home - ditto herself. She likes to keep herself busy throughout the day with her various projects and likes to keep herself trim.

cell.html: Full name: Kimberly Diane Craig née Day Kim is a self-absorbed, ever-complaining and spoilt woman who, despite her "people skills", her call centre employer can somehow not do without her.
cell.text: Full name: Kimberly Diane Craig née Day Kim is a self-absorbed, ever-complaining and spoilt woman who, despite her "people skills", her call centre employer can somehow not do without her.

cell.html: Full name: Kelvin Graham Knight Kath's better half is a purveyor of fine meats and is what Kath consideres a "great Hunk O' Spunk". Kel spends his days exercising and looking after and treating Kath with respect.
cell.text: Full name: Kelvin Graham Knight Kath's better half is a purveyor of fine meats and is what Kath consideres a "great Hunk O' Spunk". Kel spends his days exercising and looking after and treating Kath with respect.

cell.html: Full name: Brett Dean Craig Kim's husband who works in a large electronics store named "Computa City". Has a lot of affection for his dog Cujo and is best mates with Kel.
cell.text: Full name: Brett Dean Craig Kim's husband who works in a large electronics store named "Computa City". Has a lot of affection for his dog Cujo and is best mates with Kel.

cell.html: Full name: Sharon Karen Strezlecki Sharon is Kim's "second best friend" and is very unlucky with finding love. She is willing to try new things and is also a fine netball player. She has broken her fibia 5 times, is prone to hives and a bit desperately lonely. After an affair with Brett, Sharon is now dropped to be Kim's "sixth best friend".

cell.html: Full name: Epponnee-Raelene Kathleen Darlene Charlene Craig Kim and Brett's baby daughter. Her full name is frequently shortened to 'Eps', 'Baby Eps', Epponnee or Epponnee-Rae.

context.text: List of Kath & Kim characters - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
1 Characters 1.1 Main characters 1.2 Recurring characters 1.3 One-off characters
This is an incomplete list , which may never be able to satisfy certain standards for completeness. Revisions and sourced additions are welcome.
These characters have all starred in at least two episodes of Kath & Kim .
The following page is a list of characters in the Australian comedy television series Kath & Kim .
See also: List of Kath & Kim cast members .

entity.htmlSnippet:
PictureCharacterActorSeason(s)Information
Kath Day-KnightJane Turner1, 2, 3, Telemovie, 4
Full name: Kathleen Darlene Knight née Day

Kath is an empty nester who is proud of her home - ditto herself. She likes to keep herself busy throughout the day with her various projects and likes to keep herself trim.

Kim CraigGina Riley1, 2, 3, Telemovie, 4
Full name: Kimberly Diane Craig née Day

Kim is a self-absorbed, ever-complaining and spoilt woman who, despite her "people skills", her call centre employer can somehow not do without her.

Kel KnightGlenn Robbins1, 2, 3, Telemovie, 4
Full name: Kelvin Graham Knight

Kath's better half is a purveyor of fine meats and is what Kath consideres a "great Hunk O' Spunk". Kel spends his days exercising and looking after and treating Kath with respect.

align=centerBrett CraigPeter Rowsthorn1, 2, 3, Telemovie, 4
Full name: Brett Dean Craig

Kim's husband who works in a large electronics store named "Computa City". Has a lot of affection for his dog Cujo and is best mates with Kel.

Sharon StrzeleckiMagda Szubanski1, 2, 3, Telemovie, 4
Full name: Sharon Karen Strezlecki

Sharon is Kim's "second best friend" and is very unlucky with finding love. She is willing to try new things and is also a fine netball player. She has broken her fibia 5 times, is prone to hives and a bit desperately lonely. After an affair with Brett, Sharon is now dropped to be Kim's "sixth best friend".

Epponnee-Rae CraigZara Harrington and Emma Le Boeuf2x08, 3, Telemovie, 4
Full name: Epponnee-Raelene Kathleen Darlene Charlene Craig

Kim and Brett's baby daughter. Her full name is frequently shortened to 'Eps', 'Baby Eps', Epponnee or Epponnee-Rae.
